snippet.title: Mechabellum Announcement Trailer - Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
Mechabellum comes to Steam Early Access on May 11th!

An epic new wave of PvP auto-battler featuring a wide range of units, mechs, and tactical gameplay like never before. Plan your attack, deploy your troops, survey their battles, and gain intel on your opponent's setup, and Counter For Victory!

Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/669330/Mechabellum/

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK3, EU4 and HOI4.
